TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/Rebar/Chevron extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides objects for each state of a horizontal chevron. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Each property of the VisualStyleElement.Rebar.Chevron class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for a different state of a horizontal chevron.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Rebar.Chevron.Normal%2A> property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementRebarChevron1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#208](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.windows.forms.v_37_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#208](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.windows.forms.v_37_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents a hot chevron.
Docs.value: A that represents a hot chevron.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Hot property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Hot property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementRebarChevron2` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#209](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.windows.forms.v_74_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#209](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.windows.forms.v_74_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents a normal chevron.
Docs.value: A that represents a normal chevron.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Normal property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Normal property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementRebarChevron1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#208](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.windows.forms.v_127_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#208](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.windows.forms.v_127_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents a pressed chevron.
Docs.value: A that represents a pressed chevron.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Pressed property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Pressed property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementRebarChevron3` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#210](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.windows.forms.v_131_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#210](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.windows.forms.v_131_1.vb)]
